parsed_data.title: Payment Gateway Optimization
parsed_data.description: Improve the operational efficiency of the payment gateway to enhance transaction success rates and minimize downtime. This epic will focus on fine-tuning our current infrastructure to ensure reliability and faster processing for our SME clients.

parsed_data.title: Fraud Detection Enhancement
parsed_data.description: Implement advanced fraud detection algorithms to reduce fraudulent transactions. Enhancing our fraud detection capabilities will protect our users and maintain trust in our platform, thereby driving user retention and acquisition.

parsed_data.title: System Monitoring & Alerting
parsed_data.description: Establish a robust monitoring and alerting system for real-time tracking of payment transactions and system performance. This initiative will ensure prompt identification and resolution of issues, leading to improved service reliability and user satisfaction.
